name: North Pole Defense VR
description:
In this VR experience you use the triggers on your touch controllers to spawn snowballs and throw them at the giant snowmen who are attacking the north pole.

Stop all 9 of the snowmen to save Santa!

Sounds are all CC0 sounds from freesounds.org

Mountain model is Snow Mountain asset from Unity asset store.

Hand models are based on VR Cartoon Hands asset from Unity asset store.

created in Unity 2020.4 using OpenXR
